basics.label: Customer Advocate
basics.summary: Enthusiastic customer service/telesales representative with in-depth knowledge of sales, account management and training. I have over 15 years of experience in retail, real estate, medical, insurance and sales customer service.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for working on the phone all day in a call center to assist members and physicians by responding to telephone and written inquiries in a prompt, accurate and objective manner
highlights: Interacted with 50+ affiliate stations in US and Puerto Rico
Provided required weekly, monthly and quarterly reports listing sales figures and client track records
Consistently generated additional revenue through skilled sales techniques
Researched, calmed and rapidly resolved client conflicts to prevent loss of key accounts
Cashiered with two cash registers at once in tandem to maximize customer flow
Assisted in the managing of the company database and verified, edited and modified members' information.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Greet and check-in passengers, Check-in passenger baggage, Assist passengers with misplaced baggage, Verify passenger departure documentation, Assist unaccompanied minors (UMs), Comply with all security requirements, Reschedule passengers with flight interruptions, Assist passengers on arriving international flights, Documentation for all international departures, Produce all required, work-related documentation, Monitors (CRTs) and keyboards for passenger processing (carrier supplied), Carrier specific reservation/ticketing software, scales for weighing passenger baggage, Ticket and baggage tag printing equipment.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provide basic patient care including Assisting with patient care, planning and assessments including - recording vital signs, height, weight, Provide basic patient care including Assisting with patient care, planning and assessments including - recording vital signs, height, weight, input output, collect and test specimens, report and record patient's condition and patient treatments. Check deliver food trays, assist with feeding the patient if necessary, and refill water and ice, Assist patients with their mobility
